text: afmn hu qayim ealaa kulu nafs yuhsy ealayha ma teml, 'ahaqu 'an yebd, 'am hadhih almkhlwqat aleajz? wahum -mn jhlhm- jaealuu lilah shuraka' min khalqh yebdwnhm, qul lahum -ayha alrswl-: adhkuruu 'asma'ihim wsfathm, walan yajiduu min sfathm ma yjelhm 'ahlaan llebadt, 'am tkhbrwn allah bshrka' fi 'ardih la yelmhm, 'am tsmwnhm shuraka' bizahir min allfz min ghyr 'an yakun lahum hqyq. bal hssan alshaytan llkfar qawlihim albatil wsddahm ean sabil allh. wman lam ywffiqh allah lhdayth falays lah ahd yhdyh, wayuafiquh 'iilaa alhaqi walrshad
